metadata.title: CVE-2016-3995 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The timing attack protection in Rijndael::Enc::ProcessAndXorBlock andRijndael::Dec::ProcessAndXorBlock in Crypto++ (aka cryptopp) before 5.6.4may be optimized out by the compiler, which allows attackers to conducttiming attacks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3995` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcrypto++-utils - 5.6.1-6+deb8u3build0.14.04.1
libcrypto++9 - 5.6.1-6+deb8u3build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libcrypto++ package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.6.1-6+deb8u3build0.14.04.1').
